item.description:
Hi All,

Some of you may be aware of the Boston chapter of Back On My Feet which is launching soon... it's an interesting concept that started in Philly in 2008 and which was featured heavily in Runners World magazine at the time - http://www.runnerswor...

They're looking for volunteers and have an event this Wednesday in Copley Square to get more information and sign-up. Here's the info about the event...

CALLING ALL VOLUNTEERS!

Love to run? Looking for a way to play a greater part in your community? Interested in joining a team like no other?

Tell your friends, your running buddies and your fellow volunteers to come join us!

Wednesday, April 28
Champions Bar
at the Copley Marriott | 110 Huntington Avenue
6 - 8 p.m.
to learn more about
Back on My Feetâ€™s Boston Chapter Launch

Meet the Boston Back on My Feet staff!
Learn about the first three Boston homeless facility teams!
Join a team!
Sign up for orientation!
Get all the details for the May 24th launch!

$5 at the door gets you an official BOMF wristband.

You can also register on Facebook - http://www.facebook.c...

If you have any questions then please let me know and I hope to see some of you there!

Take care... Martin

group.name: Boston Informal Running Club: Home of TMIRCE:BOS

item.name: Boston Volunteer Kick-Off Happy Hour - Back On My Feet
